text: thumb|250px|The location of Fuwa District in Gifu. is a district located in Gifu Prefecture, Japan. As of July 2011, the district has an estimated population of 36,426. The total area is 106.43 km2. ==Towns and villages== *Sekigahara *Tarui ==References== Category:Districts in Gifu Prefecture
title: Fuwa District, Gifu
